original_text: So the tribes of Reuben, Gad and half the tribe of Manasseh left the other Israelites in Shiloh, in the land of Canaan. They returned to their own land in Gilead. Moses had given this land to them, as the Lord had told him.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손과 므낫세 반 지파가 가나안 땅 실로에서 이스라엘 자손을 떠나 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 받은 땅 곧 그들의 소유지 길르앗으로 가니라

sentences.original_text: So the tribes of Reuben, Gad and half the tribe of Manasseh left
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 르우벤 지파와 갓 지파 그리고 므낫세 지파 반은 떠났습니다

sentences.original_text: the other Israelites in Shiloh, in the land of Canaan
sentences.korean_translation: 가나안 땅 실로에 있던 다른 이스라엘 사람들을

sentences.original_text: They returned to their own land in Gilead
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 길르앗에 있는 자기 땅으로 돌아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Moses had given this land to them
as the Lord had told him
